description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop parsley leaves. Divide spinach among bowls, then ladle over soup. Scatter over parsley and serve with bread. Tip 1: Add 1/2 cup cooked pearl barley or cooked small pasta shapes to this recipe with the shredded chicken. Tip 2: Add a 400g can of creamed corn with the shredded chicken for a creamier soup. Tip 3: Freeze the soup for up to 3 months in airtight containers. Defrost in the fridge overnight before reheating.
